  5. Input Tag-inner

Inline Tag Input

This component, InlineTagInput, provides an interactive tag input field where users can add, display, and remove tags dynamically. It features smooth animations for adding/removing tags using Framer Motion and supports keyboard interactions for seamless usability.

Installation

1

Install Dependencies

npm i motion clsx tailwind-merge
2

Install Dependencies For Animations

npm install motion
3

Add Util File

lib/utils.ts

import { ClassValue, clsx } from "clsx";
import { twMerge } from "tailwind-merge";


export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {
  return twMerge(clsx(inputs));
}
4

Copy The Source Code

components/ui/inline-tag-input.tsx

1"use client"
2

3import type React from "react"
4import { useRef, useEffect, useState } from "react"
5import { motion, AnimatePresence } from "framer-motion"
6import { X } from "lucide-react"
7import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
8import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
9

10export interface Tag {
11  id: string
12  text: string
13}
14

15interface InlineTagInputProps {
16  className?: string
17  inputClassName?: string
18  tagClassName?: string
19  removeTagButtonClassName?: string
20  tags: Array<Tag>
21  setTags: React.Dispatch<React.SetStateAction<Array<Tag>>>
22}
23

24export function InlineTagInput({
25  className,
26  inputClassName,
27  tagClassName,
28  removeTagButtonClassName,
29  tags,
30  setTags,
31}: InlineTagInputProps) {
32  const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState("")
33  const inputRef = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null)
34  const containerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null)
35

36  const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
37    setInputValue(e.target.value)
38  }
39

40  const handleInputKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
41    if (e.key === "Enter" || e.key === ",") {
42      e.preventDefault()
43      addTag()
44    } else if (e.key === "Backspace" && inputValue === "" && tags.length > 0) {
45      removeTag(tags[tags.length - 1].id)
46    }
47  }
48

49  const handleContainerClick = () => {
50    if (inputRef.current) {
51      inputRef.current.focus()
52    }
53  }
54

55  const addTag = () => {
56    const trimmedInput = inputValue.trim()
57    if (trimmedInput && !tags.some((tag) => tag.text.toLowerCase() === trimmedInput.toLowerCase())) {
58      setTags([...tags, { id: Date.now().toString(), text: trimmedInput }])
59      setInputValue("")
60    }
61  }
62

63  const removeTag = (idToRemove: string) => {
64    setTags(tags.filter((tag) => tag.id !== idToRemove))
65  }
66

67  useEffect(() => {
68    if (inputRef.current) {
69      inputRef.current.focus()
70    }
71  }, [])
72

73  return (
74    <div
75      ref={containerRef}
76      className={cn(
77        "flex flex-wrap items-center p-2 border rounded-md w-96",
78        className,
79      )}
80      onClick={handleContainerClick}
81    >
82      <AnimatePresence>
83        {tags.map((tag) => (
84          <motion.span
85            key={tag.id}
86            initial={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.8 }}
87            animate={{ opacity: 1, scale: 1 }}
88            exit={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.8 }}
89            transition={{ duration: 0.2 }}
90            className={cn(
91              "inline-flex items-center px-2 py-1 m-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-primary text-primary-foreground",
92              tagClassName,
93            )}
94          >
95            {tag.text}
96            <Button
97              type="button"
98              variant="ghost"
99              size="icon"
100              onClick={() => removeTag(tag.id)}
101              className={cn("ml-1 h-4 w-4 p-0 hover:bg-primary/60 hover:text-white", removeTagButtonClassName)}
102              aria-label={`Remove ${tag.text} tag`}
103            >
104              <X className="h-3 w-3" />
105            </Button>
106          </motion.span>
107        ))}
108      </AnimatePresence>
109      <input
110        ref={inputRef}
111        type="text"
112        value={inputValue}
113        onChange={handleInputChange}
114        onKeyDown={handleInputKeyDown}
115        placeholder={tags.length === 0 ? "Add tags..." : ""}
116        aria-label="Add a tag"
117        className={cn(
118          "border-none focus-visible:ring-0 focus-visible:ring-offset-0 p-0 text-sm flex-1 min-w-[120px] border-0 outline-none",
119          inputClassName,
120        )}
121      />
122    </div>
123  )
124}
5

Ready To Use

Yes

Yes

Type:

Required:
Yes

Description:State Action to set Tags.
setTags

-State Action to set Tags.
